plot: Lucia, a sweet and innocent girl from a small town falls in love with Pedro, son of the most despicable man in town. Lucia's mom goes to irrational lengths to keep her daughter away from him.
title: Lucía y Pedro
plot_es: Lucia, a sweet and innocent girl from a small town falls in love with Pedro, son of the most despicable man in town. Lucia's mom goes to irrational lengths to keep her daughter away from him.
plot_en: Lucia, a sweet and innocent girl from a small town falls in love with Pedro, son of the most despicable man in town. Lucia's mom goes to irrational lengths to keep her daughter away from him.
